languages.text: "Даже твоя судьба, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, определена — ты неизбежно сгинешь, расширяя владения Человечества, и конец твой будет особенно мрачен и жуток. Плоды твоих трудов достанутся иным — вечным аристократам, обитающим на {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Марсе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терре{/g} и в иных безопасных мирах".

traits.locale_text: "Даже твоя судьба, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, определена — ты неизбежно сгинешь, расширяя владения Человечества, и конец твой будет особенно мрачен и жуток. Плоды твоих трудов достанутся иным — вечным аристократам, обитающим на {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Марсе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терре{/g} и в иных безопасных мирах".

languages.text: "Even your path is predestined, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}: you will inevitably perish on your quest to expand Humanity's domain, and your end will be particularly grim and ghastly. The fruits of your efforts will be enjoyed by others: the eternal aristocrats who dwell on {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, and other safe worlds."
languages.original_text: "Даже твоя судьба, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, определена — ты неизбежно сгинешь, расширяя владения Человечества, и конец твой будет особенно мрачен и жуток. Плоды твоих трудов достанутся иным — вечным аристократам, обитающим на {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Марсе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терре{/g} и в иных безопасных мирах".

The fruits of your efforts will be enjoyed by others: the eternal aristocrats who dwell on {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, and other safe worlds."

languages.text: "Selbst Euer Pfad ist vorbestimmt, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}.{/g}: Ihr werdet bei Eurem Bestreben, das Reich der Menschheit zu vergrößern, unweigerlich sterben, und Euer wird besonders düster und grausam sein. Die Früchte Eurer Bemühungen werden andere genießen: die ewigen Aristokraten, die auf dem {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, auf {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} und auf anderen sicheren Welten leben."
languages.original_text: "Even your path is predestined, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}: you will inevitably perish on your quest to expand Humanity's domain, and your end will be particularly grim and ghastly. The fruits of your efforts will be enjoyed by others: the eternal aristocrats who dwell on {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, and other safe worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst Euer Pfad ist vorbestimmt, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}.{/g}: Ihr werdet bei Eurem Bestreben, das Reich der Menschheit zu vergrößern, unweigerlich sterben, und Euer wird besonders düster und grausam sein. Die Früchte Eurer Bemühungen werden andere genießen: die ewigen Aristokraten, die auf dem {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, auf {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} und auf anderen sicheren Welten leben."

languages.text: « Votre voie elle-même est déjà prédéterminée, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}{/g} : vous périrez inévitablement au cours de votre quête pour étendre le domaine de l'humanité, et votre fin sera particulièrement atroce. Les fruits de vos efforts profiteront à d'autres : les éternels aristocrates résidant sur {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, sur {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} et sur d'autres mondes en sécurité. »
languages.original_text: "Even your path is predestined, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}: you will inevitably perish on your quest to expand Humanity's domain, and your end will be particularly grim and ghastly. The fruits of your efforts will be enjoyed by others: the eternal aristocrats who dwell on {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, and other safe worlds."

traits.locale_text: « Votre voie elle-même est déjà prédéterminée, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}{/g} : vous périrez inévitablement au cours de votre quête pour étendre le domaine de l'humanité, et votre fin sera particulièrement atroce. Les fruits de vos efforts profiteront à d'autres : les éternels aristocrates résidant sur {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, sur {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} et sur d'autres mondes en sécurité. »

languages.text: “即便是你，你的道路也是早已注定好的，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。在为人类帝国开疆扩土的过程中，你必将惨死途中，迎来恐怖而惨烈的结局。你所有的努力成果都将被他人瓜分。那些居住在{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}泰拉{/g}和其他安全世界，世世代代享受贵族生活的人，会将你所有的心血吞食殆尽。”
languages.original_text: "Even your path is predestined, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}: you will inevitably perish on your quest to expand Humanity's domain, and your end will be particularly grim and ghastly. The fruits of your efforts will be enjoyed by others: the eternal aristocrats who dwell on {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, and other safe worlds."

traits.locale_text: “即便是你，你的道路都是早已注定好的，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。在为人类帝国开疆扩土的过程中，你必将惨死途中，迎来恐怖而惨烈结局。你所有的努力成果都将被他人瓜分。那些居住在{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}泰拉{/g}和其他安全世界，世世代代享受贵族生活的人，会将你所有的心血吞食殆尽。”

languages.text: 「貴様の道でさえも宿命があるのだ、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}。貴様は冒険の中で否が応でも消え去って、人類の領域を拡大する。そして最後は特に悲惨で恐ろしいものになるのだ。貴様の努力の成果は他の者達、つまり{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}地球{/g}、その他の平和な惑星に住む何世代もずっと貴族である者達によって享受される」
languages.original_text: "Even your path is predestined, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}: you will inevitably perish on your quest to expand Humanity's domain, and your end will be particularly grim and ghastly. The fruits of your efforts will be enjoyed by others: the eternal aristocrats who dwell on {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, and other safe worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「貴様の道さえも宿命があるのだ、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}「ローグトレーダー{/g}。貴様は冒険の中で否が応でも消え去って、人類の領域を拡大する。そして最後は特に悲惨で恐ろしいものになるのだ。貴様の努力の成果は他の者達、つまり{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}地球{/g}、その他の平和な惑星に住む何世代もずっと貴族である者達によって享受される」

languages.text: «Incluso tu camino está predeterminado, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}: perecerás inevitablemente en tu búsqueda por expandir el dominio de la Humanidad, y tu final será particularmente sombrío y espantoso. Los frutos de tu esfuerzo los disfrutarán otros: los aristócratas eternos que moran en {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Marte{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} y otros mundos seguros».
languages.original_text: "Even your path is predestined, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}: you will inevitably perish on your quest to expand Humanity's domain, and your end will be particularly grim and ghastly. The fruits of your efforts will be enjoyed by others: the eternal aristocrats who dwell on {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, and other safe worlds."

traits.locale_text: «Incluso tu camino está predeterminado, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}: perecerás inevitablemente en tu búsqueda por expandir el dominio de la Humanidad, y tu final será particularmente sombrío y espantoso. Los frutos de tu esfuerzo los disfrutarán otros: los aristócratas eternos que moran en {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Marte{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} y otros mundos seguros».

languages.text: "Senin yolun bile önceden yazıldı {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}: İnsanlığın egemenliğini genişletme uğruna çıktığın bu görevde can vermen kaçınılmaz. Sonun da bilhassa dehşet ve karanlık olacak. Çabalarının meyvelerini, {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} ve diğer güvenli dünyalarda ikamet eden ebedî aristokratlar yiyecek."
languages.original_text: "Even your path is predestined, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}: you will inevitably perish on your quest to expand Humanity's domain, and your end will be particularly grim and ghastly. The fruits of your efforts will be enjoyed by others: the eternal aristocrats who dwell on {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, and other safe worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Senin yolun da önceden yazıldı {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}: İnsanlığın hükümranlığını genişletme uğruna çıktığın bu görevde helak olacaksın. Sonun, diğerlerinden daha kanlı ve karanlık olacak. Çabalarının meyvelerini, {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} ve diğer güvenli dünyalarda ikamet eden ebedî aristokratlar yiyecek."
